english: He wanted to tell the news to the world .
chinese: 他要把这件事告诉每一个人。

english: Every student has an opportunity to study .
chinese: 每一个学生都有机会学习。

english: Every cell of her body was alive .
chinese: 她浑身上下每一个细胞都充满着活力。

english: I have a pain in every blamed joint .
chinese: 每一个讨厌的关节都有点儿痛。

english: He looked at every soul in the congregation .
chinese: 他望着会场上的每一个人。
每一个造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: He seemed to query every damn comma .
chinese: 他简直对每一个逗点都不轻易放过。

english: They were watching her every movement .
chinese: 他们注视着她的每一个动作。

english: Every viewer has his personal rainbow .
chinese: 每一个观察者各自看到不同的虹。

english: Everyone who is old can have security .
chinese: 每一个老年人都能得到生活保障。

english: He vented his spleen on everybody around .
chinese: 他对周围每一个人都大发脾气。

english: Every member of the tribe is equal .
chinese: 部落的每一个成员都是相等的。

english: Each one merged into the next .
chinese: 每一个阶段都和下一个阶段相衔接。

english: She should make the most of every half-hour .
chinese: 她千万不能错过每一个机会。

english: Each intersection point will have two labels .
chinese: 每一个交点都将有两个号码。

english: I will see each of you separately .
chinese: 我要分别地见你们每一个人。
